Home » 15A2 Dukanipātapāḷi » 1 Paṭhamapaṇṇāsaka » 1.4 Samacittavagga
1.4.9
Paṭhamapaṇṇāsaka
Samacittavagga
41.
101“Dvinnāhaṃ, bhikkhave, micchāpaṭipattiṃ na vaṇṇemi, gihissa vā pabbajitassa vā. Gihī vā, bhikkhave, pabbajito vā micchāpaṭipanno micchāpaṭipattādhikaraṇahetu na ārādhako hoti ñāyaṃ dhammaṃ kusalaṃ.
102Dvinnāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sammāpaṭipattiṃ vaṇṇemi, gihissa vā pabbajitassa vā. Gihī vā, bhikkhave, pabbajito vā sammāpaṭipanno sammāpaṭipattādhikaraṇahetu ārādhako hoti ñāyaṃ dhammaṃ kusalan”ti.
<< 1.4.8 up1.4.10 >>
